name: Factory Reset (ReidHarry, Remy Streichenberger, Jacob Dunn, collinmc33, Carlo Barths)
name_original: Factory Reset (ReidHarry, Remy Streichenberger, Jacob Dunn, collinmc33, Carlo Barths)
description:
Factory Reset is a 3D Top-Down Tactics Autobattler where the player assembles and modifies a squad of robots on a 3x3 grid that battle with teams of defective robots by taking turns attacking in unique patterns.

How To Play

Shop Phase:

  • Drag some Chassis onto the board and buy Cores and Weapons to attached to them.
  • Every component costs 3 coins and rerolling the shop costs 1 coin.
  • When you're content with your team, click the Start Battle button.

Battle Phase:

  • Drag your units around to whichever positions you think will out-play the enemy team.
  • Click the Start Attack button to begin a turn of the battle
  • Watch as the Robots use their attack against each other
  • Repeat until someone has eliminated all of one side's robots!

Core Guide

  • Speed Core: Increase your robot's SPD by 1
  • Repair Core: Heal the robot in-front of this one by 1 HP
  • Revenge Core: When this unit survives damage, give it +1 ATK
  • Income Core: At the start of your next shop phase, gain +1 coin

Weapon Guide

  • Every robot starts with a basic weapon that hits the first unit in their row
  • Zap Cannon: Also hits the two tiles behind the impact
  • Shrapnel Shot: Also hits the two tiles diagonal and forward of the impact.
  • Flamethrower: Fires at either the top of the bottom and also hits all units in the column of the impact.
  • Mortar: Hits the mirrored position of this unit. +3 DMG (Not currently working)
